fr.formation.business

Class AmortizationLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.formation.business.AmortizationLine

  • public class AmortizationLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a "line" of an amortization table.
    Author:
    Philippe AMICE

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.math.BigDecimal amortizedK
      amortized capital for this payment
      private java.math.BigDecimal insurance

      amount of interests for this payment
      private java.math.BigDecimal payoff
      payoff for this payment (amount * rate / duration)
      private java.lang.String period
      a month or a year
      private java.math.BigDecimal remainingK
      remaining capital to be repaid
      private java.math.BigDecimal totalCost
      total cost of this payment (payoff + insurance)

      This class represents a line in the final table, with figures provided by methods of the class ComputeAmortization.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AmortizationLine

        public AmortizationLine()

      • AmortizationLine

        public AmortizationLine(java.lang.String period,
                        java.math.BigDecimal amortizedK,
                        java.math.BigDecimal interestRate,
                        java.math.BigDecimal remainingK,
                        java.math.BigDecimal payoff,
                        java.math.BigDecimal insurance,
                        java.math.BigDecimal totalCost)
        This class represents a line in the final table, with figures provided by methods of the class ComputeAmortization.
        Parameters:
        period - the date that determines the period (month or year, e.g. 01/01/2020 or 2020)
        amortizedK - amortized capital for this payment
        interestRate - interest rate for the relevant period
        remainingK - remaining capital to be repaid
        payoff - payoff for this payment (amount * rate / duration)
        insurance - amount of insurance for the relevant period
        totalCost - total cost of the loan on the relevant period (payoff + insurance)
